title: Add support to the accuracy metric
body_html:
The code that reads a blob from input files are broken. Fixing them. Also, add a binary that converts input files to blobs that can be used by Caffe2 directly.

Test plan:
verify the flow in the benchmark harness FAI-PEP without issue. Need corresponding changes in FAI-PEP in order to run it.

body:
The code that reads a blob from input files are broken. Fixing them. Also, add a binary that converts input files to blobs that can be used by Caffe2 directly. 

Test plan: 
verify the flow in the benchmark harness FAI-PEP without issue. Need corresponding changes in FAI-PEP in order to run it.
